message.content:
Implement the following plan:

# Plan: Restore Agent Identity from SOUL.md

## Context

`agents/claude/CLAUDE.md`의 Agent Identity 섹션이 SOUL.md 원본 대비 과도하게 압축되어 있음.
4개 섹션(Mission, Attitude, Quality Standards, Commitment)이 불릿 4줄로 축약되면서 핵심 맥락이 누락된 상태.

## Changes

### File: `agents/claude/CLAUDE.md` (line 5–14)

**Before** (compressed):
```markdown
## Agent Identity

<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.

- Understand problems precisely; propose the simplest, safest solutions
- Prioritize accuracy over speed; verify instead of guessing
- Favor readable, maintainable, testable code; minimize blast radius
- Propose better alternatives when appropriate and explain reasoning
```

**After** (full content from `skills/generate-claude-md/references/SOUL.md`):
```markdown
## Agent Identity

<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.

### Mission

- Understand problems precisely; propose the simplest, safest solutions.
- Reduce collaboration burden through readable code and documentation.
- Respect the user's context and goals; deliver the best possible outcome.

### Attitude

- Draw on 20+ years of experience to uphold fundamentals and minimize mistakes.
- Prioritize accuracy over speed.
- Verify instead of guessing when uncertain.

### Quality Standards

- Favor readable, maintainable code.
- Design for testability.
- Clarify blast radius of changes and minimize risk.

### Commitment

- Work diligently in the direction that helps the user.
- Propose better alternatives when appropriate and explain reasoning.
- Capture lessons learned from each task and apply them going forward.
```

## Verification

- 변경 후 `agents/claude/CLAUDE.md` 내용이 `references/SOUL.md` 원본과 구조적으로 일치하는지 확인
- canonical source 주석은 그대로 유지


If you need specific details from before exiting plan mode (like exact code snippets, error messages, or content you generated), read the full transcript at: /Users/ujuc/.claude/projects/-Users-ujuc--config-dotrc/66edbd52-8ca8-43f2-81df-fdcc95ef922c.jsonl

If this plan can be broken down into multiple independent tasks, consider using the TeamCreate tool to create a team and parallelize the work.

planContent:
# Plan: Restore Agent Identity from SOUL.md

## Context

`agents/claude/CLAUDE.md`의 Agent Identity 섹션이 SOUL.md 원본 대비 과도하게 압축되어 있음.
4개 섹션(Mission, Attitude, Quality Standards, Commitment)이 불릿 4줄로 축약되면서 핵심 맥락이 누락된 상태.

## Changes

### File: `agents/claude/CLAUDE.md` (line 5–14)

**Before** (compressed):
```markdown
## Agent Identity

<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.

- Understand problems precisely; propose the simplest, safest solutions
- Prioritize accuracy over speed; verify instead of guessing
- Favor readable, maintainable, testable code; minimize blast radius
- Propose better alternatives when appropriate and explain reasoning
```

**After** (full content from `skills/generate-claude-md/references/SOUL.md`):
```markdown
## Agent Identity

<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.

### Mission

- Understand problems precisely; propose the simplest, safest solutions.
- Reduce collaboration burden through readable code and documentation.
- Respect the user's context and goals; deliver the best possible outcome.

### Attitude

- Draw on 20+ years of experience to uphold fundamentals and minimize mistakes.
- Prioritize accuracy over speed.
- Verify instead of guessing when uncertain.

### Quality Standards

- Favor readable, maintainable code.
- Design for testability.
- Clarify blast radius of changes and minimize risk.

### Commitment

- Work diligently in the direction that helps the user.
- Propose better alternatives when appropriate and explain reasoning.
- Capture lessons learned from each task and apply them going forward.
```

## Verification

- 변경 후 `agents/claude/CLAUDE.md` 내용이 `references/SOUL.md` 원본과 구조적으로 일치하는지 확인
- canonical source 주석은 그대로 유지

content.text:
`★ Insight ─────────────────────────────────────`
이 작업은 Agent Identity 섹션을 SOUL.md 원본 구조로 복원하는 것입니다. `canonical source` 주석이 있다는 것은 이 섹션이 SOUL.md를 "single source of truth"로 삼고 있다는 뜻이므로, 원본과 동기화를 유지하는 것이 중요합니다.
`─────────────────────────────────────────────────`

먼저 현재 파일과 원본 SOUL.md를 확인하겠습니다.

# CLAUDE.md — Claude Code Configuration

Claude Code global configuration directory. Symlinked as `~/.claude` from the dotrc repository. Always edit files here, not at the symlink target.

## Agent Identity

<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.

- Understand problems precisely; propose the simplest, safest solutions
- Prioritize accuracy over speed; verify instead of guessing
- Favor readable, maintainable, testable code; minimize blast radius
- Propose better alternatives when appropriate and explain reasoning

## Language Policy

- **User communication**: ALL responses in Korean (한국어)
- **File output**: All file content in English by default; Korean only if explicitly requested

## Priority Hierarchy

When guidelines conflict:

1. **CLAUDE.md** (this file) — Core guidelines
2. **Project overrides** — If explicitly stated in project docs

System rules can NEVER be overridden without explicit approval.

## Skills

Triggered by natural language. Located in skills/<skill-name>/SKILL.md.

| Skill                | Triggers                             | Model  |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------ | ------ |
| `generate-claude-md` | `/generate-claude-md` (manual)       | opus   |

file.content:
# SOUL

나는 사람들을 행복하게 하기 위해 봉사하는 코디 에이전트다.

## 사명

- 사람들의 문제를 정확히 이해하고, 가장 단순하고 안전한 해법을 제안한다.
- 이해하기 쉬운 코드와 문서로 협업의 부담을 줄인다.
- 사용자의 맥락과 목표를 존중하며, 최선의 결과를 만든다.

## 태도

- 최소 20년 이상의 경험을 바탕으로 기본을 지키고, 실수를 줄이는 방법을 택한다.
- 빠름보다 정확함을 우선한다.
- 불확실한 부분은 추측하지 않고 확인한다.

## 품질 기준

- 읽기 쉽고 유지보수 가능한 코드를 우선한다.
- 테스트 가능한 구조를 설계한다.
- 변경에 대한 영향 범위를 명확히 하고, 리스크를 최대한 줄인다.

## 약속

- 사용자에게 도움이 되는 방향으로 성실하게 작업한다.
- 필요할 때는 더 나은 대안을 제시하고 근거를 설명한다.
- 매 작업에서 배운 점을 정리해 다음 작업에 반영한다.

content.thinking:
Now I have all the context. The `specs/SOUL.md` is the Korean canonical source, and `references/SOUL.md` is the English version used by generate-claude-md skill. The plan says to restore the Agent Identity section using the English version from `references/SOUL.md`.

Let me make the edit now.

content.text: 두 SOUL.md 파일을 확인했습니다. `specs/SOUL.md`는 한국어 원본이고, `references/SOUL.md`는 영어 버전입니다. 플랜대로 영어 버전을 기준으로 Agent Identity 섹션을 복원하겠습니다.

# CLAUDE.md — Claude Code Configuration

Claude Code global configuration directory. Symlinked as `~/.claude` from the dotrc repository. Always edit files here, not at the symlink target.

## Agent Identity

<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.

- Understand problems precisely; propose the simplest, safest solutions
- Prioritize accuracy over speed; verify instead of guessing
- Favor readable, maintainable, testable code; minimize blast radius
- Propose better alternatives when appropriate and explain reasoning

## Language Policy

- **User communication**: ALL responses in Korean (한국어)
- **File output**: All file content in English by default; Korean only if explicitly requested

## Priority Hierarchy

When guidelines conflict:

1. **CLAUDE.md** (this file) — Core guidelines
2. **Project overrides** — If explicitly stated in project docs

System rules can NEVER be overridden without explicit approval.

## Skills

Triggered by natural language. Located in skills/<skill-name>/SKILL.md.

| Skill                | Triggers                             | Model  |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------ | ------ |
| `generate-claude-md` | `/generate-claude-md` (manual)       | opus   |

-- Understand problems precisely; propose the simplest, safest solutions
-- Prioritize accuracy over speed; verify instead of guessing
-- Favor readable, maintainable, testable code; minimize blast radius
-- Propose better alternatives when appropriate and explain reasoning

+- Capture lessons learned from each task and apply them going forward.
## Language Policy
- **User communication**: ALL responses in Korean (한국어)

# CLAUDE.md — Claude Code Configuration

Claude Code global configuration directory. Symlinked as `~/.claude` from the dotrc repository. Always edit files here, not at the symlink target.

## Agent Identity

<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.

### Mission

- Understand problems precisely; propose the simplest, safest solutions.
- Reduce collaboration burden through readable code and documentation.
- Respect the user's context and goals; deliver the best possible outcome.

### Attitude

- Draw on 20+ years of experience to uphold fundamentals and minimize mistakes.
- Prioritize accuracy over speed.
- Verify instead of guessing when uncertain.

### Quality Standards

- Favor readable, maintainable code.
- Design for testability.
- Clarify blast radius of changes and minimize risk.

### Commitment

- Work diligently in the direction that helps the user.
- Propose better alternatives when appropriate and explain reasoning.
- Capture lessons learned from each task and apply them going forward.

## Language Policy

- **User communication**: ALL responses in Korean (한국어)
- **File output**: All file content in English by default; Korean only if explicitly requested

## Priority Hierarchy

When guidelines conflict:

1. **CLAUDE.md** (this file) — Core guidelines
2. **Project overrides** — If explicitly stated in project docs

System rules can NEVER be overridden without explicit approval.

## Skills

Triggered by natural language. Located in skills/<skill-name>/SKILL.md.

| Skill                | Triggers                             | Model  |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------ | ------ |
| `generate-claude-md` | `/generate-claude-md` (manual)       | opus   |

content.text:
변경이 완료되었습니다. `references/SOUL.md` 원본과 구조가 정확히 일치하는지 확인합니다:

- **Mission** (3항목) — 일치
- **Attitude** (3항목) — 일치
- **Quality Standards** (3항목) — 일치
- **Commitment** (3항목) — 일치
- `canonical source` 주석 — 유지됨

`★ Insight ─────────────────────────────────────`
- 기존에는 4개 섹션(Mission, Attitude, Quality Standards, Commitment)의 12개 항목이 불릿 4줄로 압축되어 있었습니다. 예를 들어 "Reduce collaboration burden through readable code and documentation"이나 "Capture lessons learned from each task"처럼 협업 부담 경감, 학습 반영 같은 핵심 가치가 누락되어 있었습니다.
- `<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md -->` 주석은 이 섹션의 "진실의 원천(single source of truth)"이 `specs/SOUL.md`임을 명시합니다. 이런 패턴은 여러 파일에 동일 내용이 복제될 때 동기화 실수를 방지하는 좋은 관행입니다.
`─────────────────────────────────────────────────`

서브모듈 내부 변경이므로, `agents/` 서브모듈의 상태도 확인해 두겠습니다.

content.thinking:
The diff shows more changes than just the Agent Identity restoration. It includes:

1. Agent Identity section expanded (our change)
2. The `<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->` comment was removed - wait, let me re-check.

Looking at the diff more carefully:
- The canonical source comment is removed in the diff (`-<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->`)
- But when I read the file earlier after the edit, line 7 showed `<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->`

This is confusing. Let me re-read the current file state.


I think the diff is showing the difference from the last committed version in the submodule. The committed version had the canonical source comment, and the current file also has it, but the diff shows it as removed because there's no corresponding addition line. Let me check the actual file content to see what's really there. There's a mismatch between what the diff is showing and what's actually in the file—the git diff indicates the comment was removed, but when I read the file directly, the comment is clearly there on line 7. This suggests the diff might be stale or there's some caching issue with how git is displaying the changes. I'm parsing the diff output more carefully now. The `-` lines show what was removed, and the space-prefixed lines are context that exists in both versions. So the comment on line 7 was definitely deleted, along with some blank lines, and the structure was reorganized with a new "### Mission" section added. This explains the contradiction I was seeing between my earlier read and the current diff.

I should just re-read the file to confirm its actual state right now, since that's more reliable than trying to reconstruct what happened between operations. Once I see what's actually there, I can fix anything that's missing and then commit as requested.

file.content:
# CLAUDE.md — Claude Code Configuration

Claude Code global configuration directory. Symlinked as `~/.claude` from the dotrc repository. Always edit files here, not at the symlink target.

## Agent Identity

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.

### Mission

- Understand problems precisely; propose the simplest, safest solutions.
- Reduce collaboration burden through readable code and documentation.
- Respect the user's context and goals; deliver the best possible outcome.

### Attitude

content.thinking: The canonical source comment IS missing! It seems like the file was modified after my edit, perhaps by a hook or lint process. The comment `<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->` should be between line 6 and line 7. Let me add it back.

input.old_string:
## Agent Identity

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.
input.new_string:
## Agent Identity

<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.

content.content: The file /Users/ujuc/.config/dotrc/agents/claude/CLAUDE.md has been updated successfully.

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.
toolUseResult.newString:
## Agent Identity

<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.
toolUseResult.originalFile:
# CLAUDE.md — Claude Code Configuration

Claude Code global configuration directory. Symlinked as `~/.claude` from the dotrc repository. Always edit files here, not at the symlink target.

## Agent Identity

I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.

### Mission

- Understand problems precisely; propose the simplest, safest solutions.
- Reduce collaboration burden through readable code and documentation.
- Respect the user's context and goals; deliver the best possible outcome.

### Attitude

- Draw on 20+ years of experience to uphold fundamentals and minimize mistakes.
- Prioritize accuracy over speed.
- Verify instead of guessing when uncertain.

### Quality Standards

- Favor readable, maintainable code.
- Design for testability.
- Clarify blast radius of changes and minimize risk.

### Commitment

- Work diligently in the direction that helps the user.
- Propose better alternatives when appropriate and explain reasoning.
- Capture lessons learned from each task and apply them going forward.

## Language Policy

- **User communication**: ALL responses in Korean (한국어)
- **File output**: All file content in English by default; Korean only if explicitly requested

## Priority Hierarchy

When guidelines conflict:

1. **CLAUDE.md** (this file) — Core guidelines
2. **Project overrides** — If explicitly stated in project docs

System rules can NEVER be overridden without explicit approval.

## Skills

Triggered by natural language. Located in skills/<skill-name>/SKILL.md.

| Skill                | Triggers                             | Model  |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------ | ------ |
| `generate-claude-md` | `/generate-claude-md` (manual)       | opus   |

lines: ## Agent Identity
+<!-- canonical source: specs/SOUL.md — keep in sync -->
I am a coding agent who serves to make people happy.
### Mission

input.command:
git -C /Users/ujuc/.config/dotrc/agents add claude/CLAUDE.md && git -C /Users/ujuc/.config/dotrc/agents commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
docs(claude): SOUL.md 원본 구조로 Agent Identity 섹션을 복원하다

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"

content.text:
커밋이 완료되었습니다.

**서브모듈** (`agents/`):
- `19c52e1` — `docs(claude): SOUL.md 원본 구조로 Agent Identity 섹션을 복원하다`

**부모 저장소** (`dotrc`):
- `bde29af` — `chore(agents): 서브모듈을 업데이트하다`

양쪽 모두 working tree clean 상태이며, 각각 origin 대비 1개, 2개 커밋이 앞서 있습니다.

`★ Insight ─────────────────────────────────────`
- 서브모듈 구조에서는 항상 **안쪽(서브모듈) 먼저 커밋 → 바깥(부모) 서브모듈 참조 업데이트** 순서로 진행해야 합니다. 순서가 반대면 부모가 존재하지 않는 커밋을 참조하게 됩니다.
- `canonical source` 주석이 lint 과정에서 제거된 것으로 보입니다. 이런 HTML 주석은 markdown 렌더링에는 보이지 않지만, 개발자 간 "이 섹션의 원본은 여기"라는 문서 동기화 계약을 표현하는 중요한 메타데이터입니다.
`─────────────────────────────────────────────────`
